title: Account hijjacked, then transferred. (Has this happened to anyone else?)
body:
FYI I already sent a support ticket in.

So I logged onto league, and I was about to start up a game of ranked, but before so I went to go set up a rune page. Upon opening the rune page section, I was revealed a secret message that alarmed me.  It stated my account had been comprimised and that I should change my password. Then shortly after, my account was then accessed from elsewhere. I changed the password to something basic because I was going to run a virus scan, and then make a new email, and password. I attempt to log in, and im confronted by a popup that says my account is being transferred to a new region. I am unaware of the region, and working on changing everything now, has anyone else encountered this?     http://prnt.sc/ck5vnu  <----- lightshot of the changed runepages     
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=jazzalicious <--- opgg if link is suspicious


UPDATE
---------------

So now I am no longer able to log in, in order to add to my support ticket. Ontop of that, it says I have made a 20$ RP purchase. Through my email I have been notified of where I have been accessed from. Should I create a new support ticket?

replies.body: Rest easy, we have an account team that can restore things to order and get you back in game!  You did the right thing by creating a ticket, and they'll be able to cover everything that's occurred so you won't have to create a new ticket.  Stick the the one to prevent any confusion!  In the meantime, I suggest going over our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your info in and outside of league.  We'll respond to the ticket asap!
